Package gobblin.data.management.convertion.hive

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HiveAvroSchemaProvider
    An abstraction to find Avro Schema or a HiveTable or a HivePartition
    HiveSourceWatermarker
    An interface to read previous high watermarks and write new high watermarks to state.
    HiveUnitUpdateProvider
    An interface that finds when new data was added into a Partition or a Table
    HiveUnitUpdateProviderFactory
    A factory to create HiveUnitUpdateProvider
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HdfsBasedSchemaProvider
    A HiveAvroSchemaProvider that uses the physical avro files of a HiveTable or a HivePartition on HDFS to find the Schema.
    HdfsBasedUpdateProvider
    Uses the file modification time of the data location of a HiveTable or HivePartition on HDFS
    HdfsBasedUpdateProviderFactory
    A factory class to create HdfsBasedUpdateProviders
    HiveAvroToOrcConverter
    Builds the Hive avro to Orc conversion query.
    HiveConvertExtractor
    Extracts QueryBasedHiveConversionEntitys.
    HiveConvertPublisher
    A simple DataPublisher updates the watermark and working state
    HiveQueryExecutionWriter
    The HiveQueryExecutionWriter is responsible for running the hive query available at QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity.getConversionQuery()
    HiveQueryWriterBuilder
    A DataWriterBuilder for HiveQueryWriterBuilder
    HiveSource
    A Source that creates generic workunits for a hive table or a hive partition.
    LongWatermark
    A Watermark that uses a single long value as watermark.
    QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity
    Represents a gobblin Record in the Hive avro to orc conversion flow.
    TableLevelWatermarker
    A HiveSourceWatermarker that manages Watermark at a per Table basis.
